input.sentences: more people showed up to the demonstration than expected .
they began their march demanding equal rights .
it was civilized although they doubted that was the way the media would portray it .
more people came up from behind to join the march .
they made speeches with megaphones demanding to be heard by the public .
output.sentences: A demonstration was taking place, and many people were expected to participate.
The demonstration was a march for equal rights among all races.
It was doubted that the media would portray the march in a positive light.
But people still came from all over to join the march.
March participants gave speeches through megaphones, which projected the message to the broader public.
